short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Records the class and save it in the bePersonal platform. You need an account in www.bepersonal.com.br to use this extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: bePersonal class recorder allows the teacher to record the class and save it in the bePersonal platform. You need an account in bePersonal www.bepersonal.com.br to use this extension.
